attributes.action: Make prision hard and increase sentences for serious crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The liberal approach in this county has failed. We want longer sentences.
Ben Kinsellas killers should have got 40 years minimum for this premeditated murder not the pitiful sentence they received, Remove the luxuries in prison such as tvs, play stations and all the other crap what belongs in hospitals and other establishments to help society, these low lives have no rights. Stop working on the theory that they can be rehabilitated and start thinking about justice for the victims and possible future victims!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
